sense.def: Illness Sign identical with shen bu shou she 神不守舍 , unsettled spirit. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 12: 張 真君茯苓丸，治心腎氣虛，神志不守，小便淋瀝，或不禁 , The True Lord Zhang’s pills with fu ling cure qi depletion of heart and kidneys, unruly spirit and mind , and urine dripping, sometimes with incontinence. Shen zhi bu zu 神志不足 , spirit and mind [ qi ] insufficiency [2]

Pathological Condition of forgetfulness and bone steaming brought forth by heart and kidney qi insufficiency. Yi xue ru men 醫學入門 2: 牡丹皮治神志不足，神屬心，志屬腎，故八味丸用之 以補心腎也 , “ Mu dan pi cures spirit and mind [ qi ] insufficiency . The spirit is associated with the heart; the mind is associated with the kidneys. Hence one uses the pills with the eight ingredients to supplement the heart and kidneys”. Shen zhong 身重 , the body feels heavy [23]

Alternative Names ti zhong 體重 ; shen ti zhong 身體重. Illness Sign of a feeling of extreme heaviness in the body, together with a sensation of fatigue. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Fj: 風濕，脈浮，身重，汗出 , “[In the case of an affection by] wind and moisture, the [movement in the] vessels is at the surface. The body feels heavy . [Patients] sweat”.
